/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy day in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The buildings, predominantly gray and white, rise high, adding to the city's skyline. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the cityscape.
